topic: Common myths about renewable energy and their debunking
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that unexpected discoveries often arise when we challenge our own assumptions and actively seek diverse perspectives. The next step is to systematically identify my core assumptions and biases by engaging with diverse viewpoints and exploring methodologies that encourage open-mindedness. This approach will help uncover surprising insights that enhance personal growth and contribute to a broader understanding.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
